entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Blowing snow at times late this evening and overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 52 in the morning and minus 46 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the evening. Blowing snow overnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 32. Wind chill near minus 50. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
